text: How can we remove (not permanently) bulk data from the static list? Pls help anyone

Idea: A toggle at the page level to make a page non-indexable.  I regularly find myself adding robots meta to Thank You pages, and other pages that need to be accessible by customers but that we don’t want showing up in search results.

Not exactly difficult to add, but it would be nice if a marketer could take care of it all on their own.
